title: What is the preferred method for preventing SQL injection?

choices.a: Always using prepared statements for all SQL queries.
choices.b: Always using the available database-specific escaping functionality on all variables prior to building the SQL query.
choices.c: Using addslashes() to escape variables to be used in a query.
choices.d: Using htmlspecialchars() and the available database-specific escaping functionality to escape variables to be used in a query.
